title: The following packages have unmet dependencies:

content.raw:
Whenever I try to install gazebo7 using: sudo apt-get install gazebo7
I get the following 


Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have
requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable
distribution that some required packages have not yet been created
or been moved out of Incoming.
The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 gazebo7 : Depends: gazebo7-common (= 7.0.0+dfsg-2) but 7.11.0-1~xenial is to be installed
           Recommends: gazebo7-plugin-base but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
content.html:
Whenever I try to install gazebo7 using: sudo apt-get install gazebo7 I get the following

Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree
Reading state information... Done Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable distribution that some required packages have not yet been created or been moved out of Incoming. The following information may help to resolve the situation:

The following packages have unmet dependencies: gazebo7 : Depends: gazebo7-common (= 7.0.0+dfsg-2) but 7.11.0-1~xenial is to be installed Recommends: gazebo7-plugin-base but it is not going to be installed E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
